name: Robot Heist
description:
KEYS: Arrows move, X or SPACE switches bots, R resets the current level, and Z rewinds time!

ROBOT HEIST was made in PuzzleScript! If you like it, please consider leaving a tip! You'll get a ZIP file containing a desktop version of the game (as an HTML file) and the source code (a TXT file).

Thanks to Rina Gayce, Kirk Israel, Veve Jaffa, Zach Lazymoth and Andrew Snook for playtesting & feedback!

UPDATE: 6/8/16: Minor changes. Both embedded and downloadable versions of the game have been updated!

Cover art by Al Savell.
